name: Kim Dong Hwa
status: Currently Looking for a new opportunity

about.text: I'm a Front end developer who have been developing React, Svelte, Flutter, and a bit of Node.
I'm currently looking for a company where I can have a better opportunity to develop interesting projects.
1. I developed and published two open source libaries.
2. I've been managing my own development blog. And I'll never close it. I want to share my experiences and memorize what I developed.

3. I have worked at two startup companies, where I gained experience in all aspects of project development, from initial setup to final product. My experience will be a valuable asset in the project-building process.
